name: Memo Match - matching pairs game for free
name_original: Memo Match - matching pairs game for free
description:
Are you ready to challenge your mind daily with "Memo Match" ?
A great game to exercise your brain !

GAME FEATURES
- Match pairs of cards
- Different levels of difficulty
- Colorful images of logos to be easily remembered
- New 3D game mode !

Find the matching pairs. Train your brain! Improve your observation capacities!

The easiest level makes this app a great educational game to help kids.

This game is also known as Concentration, Pelmanism, Shinkei-suijaku, Pexeso or Pairs.


All Logos & brands shown or represented in this game are copyright and or trademark of their respective corporations. This trivia game is for fun and knowledge.
